_source.text: 1 Who had an annual feast to mark the removal of a kidney stone? 2 Which civil war pitched Reds vs Whites vs Greens? 3 Catriona was the sequel to which classic adventure story? 4 Who wrote the car industry exposé Unsafe At Any Speed? 5 Beethoven's Bagatelle No. 25 is better known as what?
